comments: a(n) can be seen as a subset of the unordered pairings of the first 2n integers (A001147) with forbidden pairs (i,i+1) for all i in [1,2n-1] (all adjacent integers). The circular version of this constraint is A003436. - _Olivier Gérard_, Feb 08 2011|a(n)| is the number of perfect matchings in the complement of P_{2n} where P_{2n} is the path graph on 2n vertices. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Mar 15 2016
